dcterms:creator: Bob Kemp
Aeilko H Zwinderman
Bert Tuk
Hilbert AC Kamphuisen
Josefien JL Oberye
dcterms:description: The SleepEDF-20 dataset consists of 39 PSG records from 20 healthy individuals aged 25-34. Manual sleep stage classification based on the Rechtschaffen and Kales (R&K) standard criteria is available, allowing assessment of sleep stages such as Wake (W), N1, N2, N3 (combining N3 and N4), REM, and others.
dcterms:title: SleepEDF-20

dcterms:creator: Guo-Qiang Zhang
Licong Cui
Remo Mueller
Shiqiang Tao
Matthew Kim
Michael Rueschman
Sara Mariani
Daniel Mobley
Susan Redline
dcterms:description: The SleepEDF-78 dataset is an expanded version of SleepEDF-20, offering PSG recordings from 78 participants. Sleep scoring was performed using AASM criteria, with N3 and N4 stages merged into N3.
dcterms:title: SleepEDF-78

dcterms:creator: Guo-Qiang Zhang
Licong Cui
Remo Mueller
Shiqiang Tao
Matthew Kim
Michael Rueschman
Sara Mariani
Daniel Mobley
Susan Redline
dcterms:description: The SHHS dataset comprises 6,441 subjects, each with a single full-night PSG recording. Sleep scoring was performed using AASM criteria, with N3 and N4 stages merged into N3. Selected participants had regular sleep patterns.
dcterms:title: SHHS (Sleep Heart Health Study)
